sentences.english: Oranges have a lot of vitamin C.
I want to drink orange juice.
Spring is the season to eat strawberries.

sentences.chinese: 葡萄可以用来做葡萄酒。
sentences.english: Grapes can be used to make wine.
Eating watermelon in summer is very refreshing.
You need to soak pineapple in salt water before eating it.
Durian has a very unique smell.

sentences.chinese: 有些人很喜欢榴莲，有些人不喜欢。
sentences.english: Some people really like durian, others don't.
My older brother is in college.
My older brother is five years older than me.
My younger brother is very cute.
My younger brother is playing with toys.
I help my younger brother with his homework.
My older sister is very beautiful.
My older sister teaches me to play piano.
My younger sister is three years old.
I take care of my younger sister.
Grandfather is seventy years old this year.
I visit my grandfather (maternal) on weekends.
My mobile phone is out of battery.
He takes photos with his mobile phone.
I'm using the computer for work.
We watch TV in the evening.
Smart TVs can access the internet.
The TV screen is very big.
I use my tablet to watch videos.
Children like to play with tablets.
I use headphones to listen to music.
These headphones have good sound quality.
Don't forget to bring the charger.
There is food in the refrigerator.
The new refrigerator is energy efficient.
The washing machine is washing clothes.
Fully automatic washing machines are convenient.
I need to buy a new washing machine.
We need to turn on the air conditioner in summer.
Turn the air conditioner temperature down a bit.
The new air conditioner is very quiet.
Use the microwave to heat up food.
Be careful, the microwave is hot.
I go play with my friends.
The teacher cares about the students.
I want to become a teacher.
The students are in the classroom.
There are many doctors in the hospital.
She wants to become a doctor.
There are workers in the factory.
The police officer is directing traffic.
We need help, find a police officer.
The taxi driver is waiting for me.
The bus driver is very friendly.
The chef is cooking in the kitchen.
The chef at this restaurant is very good.
Lu Xun is a famous writer.
The writer is writing a novel.
I want to become a writer.
Rice is the staple food for Chinese people.
This bowl of rice is very fragrant.
Noodles should be eaten while hot.
I bought a loaf of bread.
This bottle of milk is expired.
Eating more vegetables is good for health.
I go to the market to buy vegetables.
The soup my mom makes is delicious.
Drinking hot soup in winter is comfortable.
This bowl of soup is too salty.
Drinking more water is good for health.
Please give me a glass of water.
Hot water can be used to make tea.
Study hard and make progress every day.
There are many books in the library.
I use a pen to write.
This pen is out of ink.
Please give me a piece of paper.
There are students in the classroom.
Please wait for me in the classroom.
I have a lot of homework.
Use a dictionary to look up new words.
When sad, you want to cry.
I am afraid of the dark.
The first speech makes people nervous.
He looked at me with surprise.
I worked all day, I'm tired.
When tired, you want to rest.
Hearing good news makes people excited.
Wear a hat on your head.
Wear shoes to protect your feet.
We use our feet to walk.
I am happy in my heart.
